quest.name: Coming to Ul'dah
journal: To be recognized as an adventurer in the city–state of Ul'dah, you must register yourself with the Adventurers' Guild.
Wymond suggests that you speak with Quicksand proprietress Momodi before you begin exploring.

Now that you have successfully registered yourself as an adventurer, you are almost ready to begin exploring Ul'dah. Speak with Momodi again to learn more about the city and the basics of adventuring.

dialogue.name: WYMOND
dialogue.text: 'Tis plain to anyone with eyes that you don't know your way around here.

dialogue.name: WYMOND
dialogue.text: If I let you go wanderin' off down the nearest dark alley, you're certain to get mugged or worse, an' I don't want that on my conscience.

dialogue.name: WYMOND
dialogue.text: So before you do anythin' else, you'll want to head over to the Quicksand, an' speak with Momodi. She's the master of the Adventurers' Guild, an' can set you on the right path.

dialogue.name: WYMOND
dialogue.text: Just take those steps over yonder an' pass through the double doors. You'll find her inside.

dialogue.name: WYMOND
dialogue.text: ...An' that's as much as you're gettin' for free. Good luck with the adventurin', adventurer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have begun a quest!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use the duty list to help you complete your task.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Why, hello there! Who might you be?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: If you're lookin' to join the Adventurers' Guild, you've come to the right place.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: My name's Momodi, and─ Pardon me, have we met before? There's somethin' awfully familiar about you...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: <sigh> I don't know if it's the Calamity, or just the march of the bleedin' years, but I'm findin' it harder and harder to keep track of all the names and faces. Anyway, forget I mentioned it─I daresay I will... Ahem.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Name's Momodi, and I own this fine establishment, if it please you.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: I also manage the Adventurers' Guild here in Ul'dah. So you might say that lookin' after green adventurers like yourself is my vocation.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: And lucky for you that it is. Without someone like me to steer you right, you'd soon find yourself out in the middle of nowhere, caught up in business you don't understand.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Like our conflict with the Amalj'aa, for example. They've been plaguin' the sultanate for nigh on, oooh...forever now.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Then there's the Garlean Empire. None can say for sure what they're plottin' these days, only that they are.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Aye, the people drink and make merry...but underneath it all, there's worry. Worry and a lingerin' feelin' of loss.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: And little wonder. It's scarce been five years since the lesser moon cracked open like a giant egg, releasin' an abomination intent on turnin' the realm into an eighth hell...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: So much was lost in the blink of an eye. 'Twas like the end of the world had come at last.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: But then things begin to get foggy. Everyone's got their own version of what happened next─some of 'em, two or three...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: You'd think people would remember somethin' like that─but the fact is, they don't. Nobody does.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: There is one thing the survivors agree on, though: the part played by a band of adventurers who laid down their lives for a realm that wasn't their own.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: They fought valiantly, and like so many others, they never returned. Deeds worth rememberin', I'm sure you'll agree. It's just a shame our recollections of those brave heroes are as jumbled as those of the Calamity itself.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Whenever we try to call their faces to mind, it's like they're standin' between us and the midday sun, permanently silhouetted... I'll bet that sounds poetic to you, doesn't it? Well it's not. It's bloody infuriatin'.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: But even if we can't remember them, we'll not let 'em be forgotten, and so we call 'em the Warriors of Light.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: And they'll forever stand as a shinin' example of what adventurers can achieve. That's why I welcome new arrivals like yourself to our fair city.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: All I ask is that you lend a helpin' hand, and try to leave Ul'dah in a better state than you found her. If you can promise that, I'd be happy to let you join the guild.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: All right, then! A promise is a promise, now!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: I'm countin' on your help to put the past behind us. We need people workin' and spendin' and bickerin' like the old days!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: And a happy and prosperous Ul'dah means more business for the Quicksand, too!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Anyroad, let's make this official.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Go ahead and write your name in the register─neat as you can.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: ...Forename Surname. Well, ain't that a charmin' name. Just rolls off the tongue, it does.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: All right, MissMister Surname! On behalf of the Adventurers' Guild, I officially─

dialogue.name: SHABBYMAN
dialogue.text: Please, sir, be merciful! Twelve as my witness, I swear to you, I'll bring you your money!

dialogue.name: BILLCOLLECTOR
dialogue.text: In the East, it is said that even a merciful god might be driven to vengeance if thrice blasphemed.

dialogue.name: BILLCOLLECTOR
dialogue.text: Be grateful you were given a fourth chance to offend. You two, attend to this scum.

dialogue.name: SHABBYMAN
dialogue.text: No, please! Mercy!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Well, ain't that a sorry sight. Nor an uncommon one, if I'm honest. Don't worry, though─if you work hard, I doubt you'll end up like him.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Just the same, if you ever need a bit of advice about one thing or another, pay me a visit. Just don't go botherin' me every time you stub your bloody toe, all right?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: 'Course, I do enjoy hearin' a lady muse on the many manhoods of her acquaintancetell of a gentleman's woes with the womenfolk from time to time...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Anyroad, welcome to Ul'dah, Forename!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Take a moment to catch your breath, and I'll teach you a little about our fair city.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This concludes the introductory game tutorial.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have taken the first step as an adventurer in the city of Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Listen well to the wisdom of Momodi Modi, then go forth and discover the incredible adventures that await you!
